text:
Thursday, 8th April 2021 was a really big day for me.

I got the #JandJ #Covid19 #Vaccine.

Whoohooo!

I didn't think twice. 

#StillSanitize #StillMask #StaySafe

I'm hoping that the vaccine reaches my family and friends back home really soon.

@UofSC 
#UniversityofSouthCarolina https://t.co/wHP8UA1XRG
